query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  postId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3GEZ22KnG87deUN.root --database kTHKHDptenrRnbqSNy7sPc --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  postId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  content TEXT NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
